objects

Class MovingGround

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody
        • objects.MovingGround
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    city.cs.engine.StepListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MovingGround
extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
implements city.cs.engine.StepListener
    A moving ground platform that oscillates between two horizontal boundaries within the game world. This class extends StaticBody and implements the StepListener interface to update the platform's position at each simulation step, creating a dynamic obstacle or support for the player.
    Since:
    1.0

      • preStep

        public void preStep(city.cs.engine.StepEvent stepEvent)
        Called before each physics step. Updates the platform's position, reversing its direction when it reaches one of its horizontal boundaries.
        Specified by:
        preStep in interface city.cs.engine.StepListener
        Parameters:
        stepEvent - The event object containing information about the simulation step.
